title: Universal Book Reader v 3.0.613 [Removes all adverts]
description:
Universal Book Reader  

REMOVES all adverts.


 The application comes with stylish and user-friendly interface and provides most comfortable reading experience for both Android smartphones and tablets. An integrated file browser allows users to read any eBook, stored on your device. UB Reader opens Adobe DRM protected files in EPUB format and PDF files.

    Side bar navigation in the library
    Ability to search in the book library
    Ability to create new shelves in the library
    Ability to sort book in the library by title, author or time of use
    Multiple books selection in the library
    List and grid views in the library
    Extensive book info for each book in the library
    Multiple book selection in the library so you can manage group of books easily
    Ability to import whole folders of books stored locally on the device in the book library
    Localized in 12 languages Ã¢â‚¬â€œ French, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian , Simplified Chinese, Swedish
